text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode

salt and pepper and then of course the

that amount of brown chuck Starline as
we know is a very leaner
it's a leaner type of meat while chuck

equal parts of you know short loin and

because number one it makes a beautiful
crust on the outside of your burger
it really does and number two since it's
not as fine as regular like table salt
that I'm used to using what happens is
it keeps all the moisture inside the
burger so that nothing makes out as it's
baking it it's cooking so when you bite
into it it's really really juicy so
using a fork very quickly going to just

like in
